title: CKGI 2.1 Sprite help
content:
Check the last page bruv

-------------------------------------------------

I DID IT, i got the pole system working like CK4-6. i almost cried when it worked, this has breathed new life into CKGI. in 2.0 it will have classic game mode only where both characters behave similarly to keen4-6. then in 2.1 ill have the new Standard game mode which will have new weapons, vehicles and game modes (such as 2p co-op) i might have to delay the level editor till 2.2 because there will be a bit of work involved and i am going to revamp the engine before so that i dont have to do the level editor 2X. as for online gaming ive looked at some tutorials and there is a POSSIBILITY that i will one day at least have 2p over the net. ill also revamp the website

P.s what levels would you want in co-op, i can easily mod the existing levels (apple acres, Bloogfoods inc, perilous pit and Ion ventalating system) to be fit for co-op.

P.P.S who would you want for the second player in co-op i had thought a vorticon elite seeming as there good in 4-6. id profer if there was some existing base of sprites eg. im not going to do lidsy becuase she only has 2 sprites

title: key definitions
content:
thanks again for the key definitions Grafix but i need to finish the engine b4 i key map, thanks but. mabye in 2.1 if not 2.0

--------------------------------------------------------------

New wepaons in CKGI 2.1,
i had planned a Laser SMG type mod of the voticon ray gun which will be automatic unlike the semi-automatic Nural stunner

a laser Rail gun that shoots Throguh walls but ammo is hard to find.

A mine (much like keen4s underwater 1) that is placed at the players deisre and will blow up and kill the opposing player if they make contact with it, it can be shot to be detonated aswell

2.1 Vehicles
i had planed to make a Jetpack, either unlimed or limited fuel (havent decided)

I had planned to make the BnB rocket (and mort counterpart) but this might be too large for the maps,

i had planned to make a hover bike thing, that can only go to a certain height in each map that sheilds the player from underneth and from the front.

i dunno, what do u think.

P.S i might need some staff to make some images if i cant cope

title: Re: key definitions
content:
I have an idea for weaponry - something called a Disruptor. Ammo is very limited, but once fired, the disruptor bullet, which is green and roundish, is deadly. When it hits an obstacle, or any object that comes in its path, it starts a chain-reaction and will destroy everything in a large radius.

About jetpack - how about making it so that when you turn it on, the jetpack uses a certain amount of "fuel" (percentage decrease). When thrust is used (to go "up") the percentage drops at a fast pace. However, when Keen stands on ground, the jetpack "regenerates", regains the percentages.

These are only ideas, however...

Edit: About images: Perhaps I can do something. I'm not good at drawing, I'm better at 3D stuff (well not that much there either)------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

"Take evasive action!"

title: Re: weapon
content:
larger. BIG. Ok, let's see if I can put it in some understandable form...

Sort of - a diameter of 30-40 Keen Sprites (roughly). Enough to cover at least 3/4 of the screen graphically - but the most outer areas of the explosion sphere are weak enough for keen or the others to survive it.

Let's say 3/4 of the screen = 600 pixels. Than the explosion has a radius of 300 pixels (diameter 600). Keen is killed when he is within 500 pixels of the epicenter.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dexter.gif[/img] I guess you might want to read that again or draw it down. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] I think the 2nd paragraph is more like some data for you.

One thing - don't overwhelm the level with ammunation of this kind unless the players will tend to rely on this. Each dropsite (under dropsite I mean the collectible gun item) should perhaps only give you 1 bullet. And depending on map size, I don't advise more than 3 dropsites. Respawn time of the dropsite (re-appearance (waits to be collected again)) should be rather huge. The goal is to keep the player from collecting more and more of this deadly item in a short time.

And depending on the abilities of Game Maker, some transparency effect of the explosion would be cool, but this is not so important. "From one medium size green bullet to a chain-reaction like light-green explosion covering half the map[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] "------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

"Take evasive action!"

title: hehe
content: I like the spear/javelin.  I've never been fond of sniper rifles, uzis, or flame throwers... the shotgun's okay, but definitely not fitting of Keen (that's Dangerous Dave's thing)... and a big ol' minigun would completely overwhelm a 9 year old.  Cute sprites, though!

title: Re: hehe
content:
I agree.
Keen as I (and I assume Tom Hall) envision him wouldn't exactly run around with a chainsaw or minigun ripping enemies to bloody pieces.

Keen would use a frisbee to throw at enemies for instance.
(Oh, right after I say that I realise I probably thought of that because I've been playing Zelda: Windwaker where Link throws a mean boomerang... fun game so far.)Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: hmm
content:
Ret8: I loved WindWaker, especially the art style--I hope you have fun with it.

Creative Madman: As much as I hate it, I think "Security Center" from Keen5 would make a good multiplayer level--the beginning areas have a few different routes to get around in, and there's lots of room to dodge. Levels with wide open spaces, I'd avoid--like Crystalus or Perilous Pit. Maybe try and use Energy Flow Systems? Not sure.

title: Game Maker
content:
Hey, Creative Madman, you're using Game Maker right? Game Maker by Mark Overmars?
I have version 6 of this program and am experienced in using it (except the code) and I'd like to help if I can. I already have a work in progress where Keen can run, jump, shoot, and climb ledges with all the correct sprites (pogoing and pole climbing soon to come I hope), but this is pretty much my only experience in Mods of any kind. The sprites were ripped but other than that I pretty much did everything.
So just letting u know that I really look forward to your game, and in the meantime, is there anywhere I can go to get a earlier version of it? (the downloads on your site dont work, but you proly knew that)

PS, I'm totally new to forums on the net - if I make an error on something or do something stupid, let me know so I don't do it again - thanx [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] The Universe is Toast...

title: block solid on top only
content:
Yup, I know exactaly what you mean - the ledges in K4-6 where if you press down and CTRL at the same time, you drop down. I haven't even attempted that yet, and I don't think I'm gonna have it in my game because I'm not going to have a strong platform element in it (basically, you fly around in your ship to go to places, and at those places you walk around like in K4-6, minus advanced moves, unless it's an enemy place like Koreth III Base for example.)
Anyway, what might really help is someone who knows whatever language Keen4-6 was programmed in( is it C?), and could get the source code and explain the way that that particular action is written.
And if I may humbly make a sugestion about CKGI...can you change Mortimer's sprites to make him in all black? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] (I know what my name says, and I didnt get it just to put momentum behind this request - I just couldnt think of a better name at the time). It just seems to me that Mortimer should be in all black because he's the grand villian and all and it just seems very fitting.
It's up to you - shouldnt be that difficult since the objects will run just the same as long as the sprite is the same size and shape.The Universe is Toast...

title: Re:
content: Well, Keens 4-6 are probably written in C with some assembler, but no one's going to be able to get the source. None of the actions in Keen is really unique (besides the pogo), so you can probably find someone to tell you how to accomplish them. You don't need the Keen source for that.
